entry.data:
SNOW AND RAIN LIKELY
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
